languages.text: "Прошу почтенную публику не расходиться! Я собирался огласить последнюю волю Денза после того, как он отправится в огонь, но обстоятельства сложились иначе".
"I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."
languages.original_text: "Прошу почтенную публику не расходиться! Я собирался огласить последнюю волю Денза после того, как он отправится в огонь, но обстоятельства сложились иначе".

traits.locale_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he's been delivered into the flames, but the circumstances have dictated otherwise."

"I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he's been delivered into the flames, but the circumstances have dictated otherwise."
"I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."
"I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."
"I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

languages.text: “我希望能请我们尊贵的客人们再等一会儿！我本打算等丹兹火化之后再宣读他的遗嘱，但在刚刚的情况下，我没办法这么做。”
languages.original_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

traits.locale_text: “我希望能请我们尊贵的客人们再等一会儿！我本打算等丹兹火化之后再宣读他的遗嘱，但在刚刚的情况下，我没办法这么做。”

languages.text: «¡Me gustaría pedir a los estimados asistentes que se queden un poco más! Iba a anunciar la última voluntad y el testamento de Denz tras su cremación, pero las circunstancias lo han impedido».
languages.original_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

traits.locale_text: «¡Me gustaría pedir a los estimados asistentes que se queden un poco más! Iba a anunciar la última voluntad y el testamento de Denz tras su cremación, pero las circunstancias lo han impedido».

languages.text: 「参列者の皆さま、今しばらくお待ちください！デンツが炎の中に引き渡された後で彼の遺言を発表するつもりでしたが、それが状況となってしまいました」
languages.original_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

traits.locale_text: 「参列者の皆さま、今しばらくお待ちください！デンツが炎の中に引き渡された後で彼の遺言を発表するつもりでしたが、それが状況となってしまいました」

languages.text: "Ich darf die geschätzten Gäste bitten, noch ein wenig zu bleiben! Ich wollte Denz' Testament verlesen, nachdem er den Flammen übergeben wurde, aber die Umstände wollten es anders."
languages.original_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Ich darf die geschätzten Gäste bitten, noch ein wenig zu bleiben! Ich wollte Denz' Testament verlesen, nachdem er den Flammen übergeben wurde, aber die Umstände wollten es anders."

languages.text: « Je demande à nos très estimés invités de bien vouloir rester encore quelques instants ! Je devais énoncer les dernières volontés de Denz et son testament après son incinération, mais les circonstances en ont décidé autrement. »
languages.original_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

traits.locale_text: « Je demande à nos très estimés invités de bien vouloir rester encore quelques instants ! Je devais énoncer les dernières volontés de Denz et son testament après son incinération, mais les circonstances en ont décidé autrement. »

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer konuklardan biraz daha durmalarını rica edeceğim. Denz'i alevlere teslim ettikten sonra son arzusunu ve vasiyetnamesini açıklayacaktım. Gelgelelim koşullar buna müsaade etmedi."
languages.original_text: "I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer! I was going to announce Denz's last will and testament after he was delivered into the flames, but the circumstances dictated otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer konuklardan biraz daha durmalarını rica edeceğim. Denz'in son arzusunu ve vasiyetnamesini, onu alevlere teslim ettikten sonra açıklayacaktım ama koşullar buna izin vermedi."
